name: Puzzlemania (itch) (HamsterDogg55)
description:
Made for Deynum's Completion Jam. The theme was Out of Place, and my interpretation was to make a series of slide puzzles, based on my Game Making Journey.

Sorry about not having a HTML build. I spent a few hours trying to fix it, but nothing worked :(

Need Help? https://www.wikihow.com/Solve-Slide-Puzzles

Good luck!
